title: The Bay and ReturnBear Partner to Make Returns Easier Français - Canada NewsWire
summary: The Bay partners with ReturnBear to simplify returns for online shoppers, including items purchased from Marketplace sellers. ReturnBear technology enables QR code drop-off returns at Hudson's Bay stores, with tracking and consolidation logistics for enhanced customer experience.

title: How Influencer Marketing will Change the Business Landscape in 2023 - Indian Retailer
summary: The article explores how AI is revolutionizing the food and agriculture industry, enhancing productivity, sustainability, and innovation while optimizing various processes such as crop management, pest detection, weed management, and food safety compliance through advanced algorithms and data-driven insights.
green_innovation: TRUE. The integration of artificial intelligence (AI) in the agri-food sector to optimize sustainability in various processes aligns with the definition of green innovation.
business_innovation: TRUE. The article discusses the implementation of AI technologies in food and agriculture, representing a new and improved business process in the sector.
green_product: TRUE. The use of AI to enhance crop management, pest detection, and food safety compliance contributes to the development of products or services that significantly reduce environmental impact throughout their life cycle.
green_process: TRUE. The adoption of AI technologies, such as computer vision, machine learning, and robotics, in agriculture promotes sustainability by minimizing environmental impacts and improving operational efficiency.
greenwashing: FALSE. The article provides legitimate examples of how AI is being utilized to enhance sustainability and operational efficiency in the food and agriculture sector, without any indication of false or misleading environmental claims.
